mapper.insert: /* productInsert */ insert into prd_master (PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_MANUFACTURER, PRD_ORIGINE, PRD_DISPLAY, PRD_PRCPRICE, PRD_ORGPRICE, PRD_SALEPRICE, PRD_INPUTDATE, PRD_INPUTID, PRD_DESC) values (#{prd_no}, #{prd_name}, #{prd_manufacturer}, #{prd_origine}, #{prd_display}, #{prd_prcprice}, #{prd_orgprice}, #{prd_saleprice}, sysdate, 'hyuna', #{prd_desc})
mapper.select: select prd_no, prd_name, prd_desc, prd_display, prd_saleprice, to_char(prd_inputdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')prd_inputdate from prd_master where prd_display ='on' or prd_display ='Y' order by prd_no desc

select m.prd_no, prd_name, nvl(prd_desc,'') as prd_desc, prd_saleprice, nvl(img.img_1,'') as img_1 from prd_master m left join prd_img img on m.prd_no = img.prd_no where prd_display ='on' or prd_display ='Y' order by prd_no desc

/* prdMgrDetail */ select m.prd_no as prd_no, prd_name, prd_manufacturer, prd_origine, prd_display, prd_prcprice, prd_orgprice, prd_saleprice, prd_desc, nvl(img.img_1,'') as img_1, nvl(img.img_2,'') as img_2, nvl(img.img_3,'') as img_3 from prd_master m left join prd_img img on m.prd_no = img.prd_no where m.prd_no = #{prd_no}

select prd_d_no, prd_d_display, color_detail, model_brand, model_machine from prd_detail pd left join color c on pd.color_no = c.color_no left join model m on pd.model_no = m.model_no where pd.prd_no= #{prd_no}
